text: Jin Youzhi (17 August 1918 – 10 April 2015), also known as Aisin Gioro Puren, was the fourth and youngest son of Zaifeng. He was the last surviving sibling of Puyi, the final ruler of the Qing Dynasty and last Emperor of China.满清皇室后裔百态人生：和普通人一样生活 , 2005-03-24. "Attitudes of the descendants of the Manchu royalty: Their lives as ordinary people" Youzhi was born in the Prince Chun Mansion in Shichahai, Beijing. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:2015 deaths Category:People from Beijing
title: Jin Youzhi
